page.title: 03EVENTS:SKEEBY
page.content: These are the events which took place in the area over the past two months.Skeeby won the Best Kept Village Contest this year and the prize was a seat from the Richmondshire District Council. In Skeeby village hall a pie and peas supper was held and raised Â£28 for hall funds.There was talk about Home Ecomomics course which will start next year.Subscriptions are Â£5.There was a short film on Skeeby shown by Mr Arthur Hutchinson in memory of his late parents Mr and Mrs William Hutchinson who used to live there. The president of Skeeby Mrs E Russell welcomed 17 members and Mrs Calvert VCO to an annual meeting to discuss the normal monthly business.
